thread.title: BRIEF-PSEG Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Operating Earnings $0.57 Per Share

title: BRIEF-PSEG Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Operating Earnings $0.57 Per Share

organizations.name: reuters) - public service enterprise group inc

text: February 23, 2018 / 12:39 PM / in 17 minutes BRIEF-PSEG Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Operating Earnings $0.57 Per Share Reuters Staff Feb 23 (Reuters) - Public Service Enterprise Group Inc : * PSEG ANNOUNCES 2017 RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.00 TO $3.20 * PSEG REPORTED NET INCOME FOR Q4 2017 OF $1.88 PER SHARE * NON-GAAP OPERATING EARNINGS FOR Q4 2017 WERE $0.57 PER SHARE * SEES 2018 NON-GAAP EPS $3.00 - $3.20 * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.10 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.56 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
